jobDescription: Be part of a rapidly-expanding advertising agency with a global reach!Hylink is the largest, independently owned digital advertising and media agency in China.As a Media Analyst intern, you will use your analytical mindset and knowledge of the industry to provide insights and promote client satisfaction through the media networks. You will help boost the online presence of our clients by interpreting media performance and optimizing media strategies.You will evangelize new Hylink products and technologies throughout the agency, and develop and manage strong relationships with internal agency influencers and decision-makers, driving scalable product adoption and growth across the broader portfolio of accounts.You will learn the skills necessary to succeed in advertising, as well as understand emerging business models as they happen. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing business grows. You will be involved with a team of fast-paced, multitasking high-achievers. Covering training across programmatic, digital, industry analysis, and client service, you will develop influential, relationship-building skills, learn to provide Hylink-caliber client service, and fully grasp research and market analysis.You will anticipate how decisions are made, and persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Hylink's key partners and objectives.
